Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and relationships

Posts.Content: With Kidney cancer we don't really get the choice as both Chemo and RT have no real effect on K.C. Would I do everything I could and take every advantage however small and cover all possibilities including Chemo and RT just to make sure I'd thrown everything I could at it...Like a shot but I know all cancers are different, and react differently to therapies. Its just that I'd really want to do everything possible and take every opportunity to eradicate it and eradicate it again.
